« 2:15 » Newbury

SAT 27 MAR 2010

EBF Mares´ "National Hunt" Novices´ Hurdle Final (Limited Handicap) (Listed Race) (CLASS 1) (4yo+) Winner £22,804CH4
Soft 2m5f Number of runners: 18

SHOW:
Choose comment type:
Racing Post Poker
Sign up to play now
Card & form print-outs
Print this race card
Cards help

£40,000 guaranteed For 4yo+ which are E.B.F. eligible and which have not run in a Flat race, and which, prior to March 22nd, have been placed in the first six in an E.B.F. Mares' 'National Hunt' Novices' Hurdle Race Qualifier during the current season (In the event of the abandonment of a qualifier, any horse which had been declared to run in that race under Rule (F)89 at the declaration stage, or any horse entered to run if the time of abandonment was prior to the declaration stage, will be qualified to enter the Final) Weights highest weight 11st 10lb Minimum weight 10-4 Penalties (no penalties after the publication of the weights) Banjaxed Girl's Handicap Mark 135 Entries 23 pay £ 180 Penalty value 1st £22,804.00 2nd £8,556.00 3rd £4,284.00 4th £2,136.00 5th £1,072.00 6th £536.00

  • PAST WINNERS

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

A typically well-contested renewal that includes plenty of unexposed/improving types from top southern yards but progressive northern raider DIAVOLERIA is taken to trump them all. She´s recovered well from a broken bone in her leg to show herself better than ever this season and still hasn´t had many chances at this sort of distance.
